dublin_core.dcvalue: An increasing number of US states and localities have implemented comprehensive policies prohibiting tobacco smoking in all indoor areas of public places and worksites However private settings such as homes and vehicles remain a major source of exposure to secondhand smoke SHS for many people This study assessed the prevalence and correlates of voluntary smoke free rules and SHS exposure in homes and vehicles among US adults
Smoke-free rules and secondhand smoke exposure in homes and vehicles among US adults, 2009-2010.
